wordGroup: typewriter ribbon 打字带；打字机色带

sentences.en: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她拿起一张纸，把它塞入打字机，发出一阵“嗒嗒”的声音。

sentences.en: She handed over a form, then bobbed down again behind a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她递过来一张表格，又快速坐回到打字机后面。

sentences.en: He was in his office, battering the keyboard of his computer as if it were an old manual typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他在办公室重重地敲打着他的计算机键盘，好像在用一部老式的手动打字机。
